mapper.sql: notify.id as notify_id, notify.content as notify_content, notify.create_time as notify_create_time, notify.last_edit_time as notify_last_edit_time, notify.expire_time as notify_expire_time, notify.is_active as notify_is_active
mapper.select:
select * from t_notify
AND is_active = ${isActive}
AND content~'${keyword}'
order by ${orderName} desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_notify
id,
content,
create_time,
last_edit_time,
expire_time,
is_active,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_notify
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_edit_time = #{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_notify set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_edit_time = #{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
